description:
James has a really big cock, even when it's soft!

He told us that he was into bodybuilding for a while. Of course, my first questions was, "How did you fit that thing into your posing trunks?"

That made him laugh.

"It wasn't easy," he said. "I had to do some arranging."

Then I had to ask him the other thing I've always wondered about bodybuilding competitions.

"Weren't you worried that you would pop a boner on stage?"

"Yeah, of course," he said. "Everyone is. But once you get up there you're kind of nervous and that keeps it from, you know..."
title: James
